titulo: Estuche casero para marco de bicicleta
descripcion: Contenedor de objetos creado con tejas(PVC), bisagras de caja plástica y láminas de cielo raso(PVC)

titulo: HOMEMADE VR HEADSET USING HOUSEHOLD ITEMS
descripcion: Hey, did you know that you can make a VR headset at home? And it is not gonna cost you a thing as all you need, you can probably find around your house. It super easy to make and anyone can do it. :)
